channel.title: RunelutionX! **ECO** [718/753]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Hello Moparscapers! I'm Kevin Owner of RunelutionX were a brand new server looking for new players!!![/size]
Download Our Client and play today!!: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/jwjz0mh9qro7qzd/RunelutionX.jar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/jwjz0mh9qro7qzd/RunelutionX.jar[/url]
Sign Up on the Forums: [url=http://www.runelutionx.freeforums.net]http://www.runelutionx.freeforums.net[/url]
[size=14pt]Credits to: Fox2007 for the server base Dragonite for coding[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rwAFC75.jpg[/img]
Features within the server: We have a friendly Owner and Staff team who are willing to help We have some custome Items aswell All Bosses are working Donator Zone All GWD Bosses Working!!!! Party Demon (Oblivion) King Black Dragon And Queen Black Dragon Barrows Fight Dominion Tower PvP Teleports Zombie Onslaught All Skills Working All Working Auras View Account Achievments And Aload More Of Other Stuff!!!
[b]Home with shops!:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lKVOcJF.png[/img]
[b]Pking Shop:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mu9MbiX.png[/img]
[b]Zombie Onslaught:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dUJLY0u.png[/img]
[b]Oblivion:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4TauTmu.png[/img]
[b]Pure Shop:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ANTGNjT.png[/img]
[b]Skill Shops:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mymn1D0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JeDAB5b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aFnIkDA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5VGemXr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cEuO3gM.png[/img]
[b]Custom dz Teleport:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ID72w8P.png[/img]
[b]Donator Shops:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BsKQEQZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/feMdw2T.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u8eIcc6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jwNUOpQ.png[/img]

item.title: RunelutionX! **ECO** [718/753]
item.dc:creator: @angelofdeath396 angelofdeath396
item.description:
@angelofdeath396 wrote:

Yes, and server is back online guys. I was having serious problems with hosting, but now it works. You can come and visit anytime you guys like. I fixed some things like blood barrage, added some prices, and I’m currently editing some things for the shops. Logs are not worth 2.4 billion coins anymore (lol), and I’m finding a way to add in Grand Exchange. Enjoy!

Read full topic

item.title: RunelutionX! **ECO** [718/753]
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

angelofdeath396:

The server itself has gone through many updates for the past few days.

That has nothing to do with it having malware or not?

But anyway , scanned the file on VirusTotal.com

Doesn’t seem to be malicious

Read full topic

item.title: RunelutionX! **ECO** [718/753]
item.dc:creator: @angelofdeath396 angelofdeath396
item.description:
@angelofdeath396 wrote:

DukeDice:

malware

Proof of malware? I play just fine on it. -.-
There is no virus FYI. The server itself has gone through many updates for the past few days.

And it’s a good server. Flawless PK, and a lot more. Just try it out and stop complaining.

Read full topic
